Interface ChessPieceContract

All Known Implementing Classes:
Bishop, ChessPiece, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public interface ChessPieceContract
Contract for all chess pieces.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    canKill(ChessPiece piece)
    Determines if this chess piece can kill the given piece.
    boolean
    canMove(int row, int col)
    Determines if this chess piece can move to the given cell.
    Color
    getColor()
    Returns the color of this chess piece.
    int
    getColumn()
    Returns the current column of this chess piece.
    int
    getRow()
    Returns the current row of this chess piece.

  • Method Details

    • getRow

      int getRow()
      Returns the current row of this chess piece.
      Returns:
      the row (0-7)

    • getColumn

      int getColumn()
      Returns the current column of this chess piece.
      Returns:
      the column (0-7)

    • getColor

      Color getColor()
      Returns the color of this chess piece.
      Returns:
      the color (BLACK or WHITE)

    • canMove

      boolean canMove(int row, int col)
      Determines if this chess piece can move to the given cell.
      Parameters:
      row - the target row
      col - the target column
      Returns:
      true if the piece can move to (row, col), false otherwise

    • canKill

      boolean canKill(ChessPiece piece)
      Determines if this chess piece can kill the given piece.
      Parameters:
      piece - the target piece to potentially kill
      Returns:
      true if this piece can kill the given piece, false otherwise
